goals__remit:
SAMMAN Law & Corporate Affairs is one of the few French law firms specializing in public and regulatory affairs and practicing in both Paris and Brussels. 
 
Our expertise lays on: a cross-practice team of lawyers and consultants with multiple areas of specialization; the double location of our office in Paris and Brussels; and a strong and innovative vision of the legal profession.
